meanings.definition: A fleshy extension at the back of the soft palate that hangs above the throat.
meanings.sent1: The uvula helps prevent food from going up into the nose.
meanings.sent2: When you swallow, the uvula moves to close off the nasal passage.
meanings.sent3: The uvula wiggled comically when he tried to imitate a frog's croak.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter sounded like a songbird with a uvula made of silk.
meanings.sent5: The uvula, like a tiny guardian, watches over the entrance to the throat.
